languages.text: "В свои погружаясь гадания на крови и плоти ушедших, я обращаюсь к реликвии древней, бесценной. То карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Таро Его{/g}, что культу от пряхи достались, сплетшей первую нить паутины. Один из раскладов я сделал, когда еще силы хватало мне выйти из храма и души ушедших вести в путь последний. Тогда разглядел я в сплетениях судьбы нашу встречу. Но время — увы. Так год за годом мы ждали. И вот час настал".

traits.locale_text: "В свои погружаясь гадания на крови и плоти ушедших, я обращаюсь к реликвии древней, бесценной. То карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Таро Его{/g}, что культу от пряхи достались, сплетшей первую нить паутины. Один из раскладов я сделал, когда еще силы хватало мне выйти из храма и души ушедших вести в путь последний. Тогда разглядел я в сплетениях судьбы нашу встречу. Но время — увы. Так год за годом мы ждали. И вот час настал".

languages.text: "As I delve into my divinations from the flesh and blood of the departed ones, I turn to a relic most ancient and priceless. It is {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, inherited by the cult from the Matriarch Spider who spun the first thread. One of the readings I did back when I still had the strength to leave the temple and usher souls on their final journey. That was when, in the intricate tangle of destiny, I glimpsed our meeting. But when we would meet, alas, was not revealed to me. So we waited, year after year. And now the hour has come."
languages.original_text: "В свои погружаясь гадания на крови и плоти ушедших, я обращаюсь к реликвии древней, бесценной. Один из раскладов я сделал, когда еще силы хватало мне выйти из храма и души ушедших вести в путь последний. Тогда разглядел я в сплетениях судьбы нашу встречу. Но время — увы. Так год за годом мы ждали. И вот час настал".

traits.locale_text: "As I delve into my divinations from the flesh and blood of the departed ones, I turn to an ancient and priceless relic. These are His tarot cards, which the cult inherited from the Founder of the Weave who spun the first thread. One of the card readings is from a time when I still had the strength to leave the temple and usher souls on their final journey. That was when, in the intricate tangle of destiny, I glimpsed our meeting. But alas, not the time of it. So we waited, year after year. And now the hour has come."

languages.text: "Wenn ich in meine Prophetie aus dem Fleisch und Blut der Übergegangenen eintauche, wende ich mit einem uralten und unschätzbar wertvollen Relikt zu. Sie sind {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein Tarot{/g}, das der Kult von der Matriarchenspinne geerbt hat, die einst den ersten Faden gesponnen hat. Eine meiner Deutungen aus der Zeit, in der ich noch die Kraft hatte, den Tempel zu verlassen und Seelen auf ihrer letzten Reise zu gleiten. Damals habe ich im komplexen Gewirr des Schicksals einen Blick auf unsere Begegnung erhascht. Mir wurde jedoch nicht offenbart, wann wir uns begegnen würden. Also haben wir gewartet, Jahr für Jahr. Und nun ist die Stunde gekommen."
languages.original_text: "As I delve into my divinations from the flesh and blood of the departed ones, I turn to a relic most ancient and priceless. It is {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, inherited by the cult from the Matriarch Spider who spun the first thread. One of the readings I did back when I still had the strength to leave the temple and usher souls on their final journey. That was when, in the intricate tangle of destiny, I glimpsed our meeting. But when we would meet, alas, was not revealed to me. So we waited, year after year. And now the hour has come."

Eine meiner Deutungen aus der Zeit, in der ich noch die Kraft hatte, den Tempel zu verlassen und Seelen auf ihrer letzten Reise zu gleiten. Damals habe ich im komplexen Gewirr des Schicksals einen Blick auf unsere Begegnung erhascht. Mir wurde jedoch nicht offenbart, wann wir uns begegnen würden. Also haben wir gewartet, Jahr für Jahr. Und nun ist die Stunde gekommen."

languages.text: «Mientras me adentraba en mis adivinaciones a partir de la carne y la sangre de los fallecidos, me dirigí a una reliquia ancestral y de valor incalculable. Se trataba de {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}, heredado por el culto de manos de la Araña Matriarca, que urdió el primer hilo. En una de las lecturas que realicé cuando aún tenía fuerzas para abandonar el templo y enviar almas a su último viaje, en la compleja maraña del destino, atisbé nuestro encuentro. Sin embargo, no se me reveló cuándo se produciría. De modo que esperamos, año tras año. Y ahora, el momento ha llegado».
languages.original_text: "As I delve into my divinations from the flesh and blood of the departed ones, I turn to a relic most ancient and priceless. It is {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, inherited by the cult from the Matriarch Spider who spun the first thread. One of the readings I did back when I still had the strength to leave the temple and usher souls on their final journey. That was when, in the intricate tangle of destiny, I glimpsed our meeting. But when we would meet, alas, was not revealed to me. So we waited, year after year. And now the hour has come."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras me adentraba en mis adivinaciones a partir de la carne y la sangre de los fallecidos, me dirigí a una reliquia ancestral y de valor incalculable. Se trataba de {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}, heredado por el culto de manos de la Araña Matriarca, que urdió el primer hilo. En una de las lecturas que realicé cuando aún tenía fuerzas para abandonar el templo y enviar almas a su último viaje, en la compleja maraña del destino, atisbé nuestro encuentro. Sin embargo, no se me reveló cuándo se produciría. De modo que esperamos, año tras año. Y ahora, el momento ha llegado».

languages.text: 「死者の血と肉からディビネーションを掘り下げながら、私は最も古く貴重な遺物に目を向ける。最初の糸を紡いだ、教団が女帝クモから受け継いだ{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}主のタロットだ{/g}。私に神殿を去って魂に最後の旅をすすめる力があった頃に読み解いた内容の一つだ。その時、複雑に絡み合った運命の中で、我らの出会いを垣間見た。しかし残念ながら、いつ出会うのかは明かされずにいた。ゆえに我らは何年も何年も待ち続けた。そしてようやく、その時が来たのだ」
languages.original_text: "As I delve into my divinations from the flesh and blood of the departed ones, I turn to a relic most ancient and priceless. It is {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, inherited by the cult from the Matriarch Spider who spun the first thread. One of the readings I did back when I still had the strength to leave the temple and usher souls on their final journey. That was when, in the intricate tangle of destiny, I glimpsed our meeting. But when we would meet, alas, was not revealed to me. So we waited, year after year. And now the hour has come."

traits.locale_text: 「死者の血と肉からディビネーションを掘り下げながら、私は最も古く貴重な遺物に目を向ける。最初の糸を紡いだ、教団が女帝クモから受け継いだ{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}主のタロットだ{/g}。私に神殿を去って魂に最後の旅をすすめる力があった頃に読み解いた内容の一つだ。その時、複雑に絡み合った運命の中で、我らの出会いを垣間見た。しかし残念ながら、いつ出会うのかは明かされずにいた。ゆえに我らは何年も何年も待ち続けた。そしてようやく、その時が来たのだ」

languages.text: “当我通过死者的血肉进行预言时，我选择了最古老、最贵重的圣物进行了占卜，那便是{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}，是教派从蛛母族长那里继承而来的。那个时候，我还有力气离开圣殿，也能带着大限已至的灵魂踏上最终的旅途。那个时候，我看到了其中一张牌上的预言。在那错综复杂的命运之中，我预见了我们的相遇。但遗憾的是，我并没有看到我们什么时候才会相遇，于是我们年复一年地等待着。如今，预言的时刻到了。”
languages.original_text: "As I delve into my divinations from the flesh and blood of the departed ones, I turn to a relic most ancient and priceless. It is {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, inherited by the cult from the Matriarch Spider who spun the first thread. One of the readings I did back when I still had the strength to leave the temple and usher souls on their final journey. That was when, in the intricate tangle of destiny, I glimpsed our meeting. But when we would meet, alas, was not revealed to me. So we waited, year after year. And now the hour has come."

traits.locale_text: “当我通过死者的血肉进行预言时，我选择了最古老、最贵重的圣物进行了占卜，那便是{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}，是教派从蛛母族长那里继承而来的。那个时候，我还有力气离开圣殿，也能带着大限已至的灵魂踏上最终的旅途。那个时候，我看到了其中一张牌上的预言。在那错综复杂的命运之中，我预见了我们的相遇。但遗憾的是，我并没有看到我们什么时候才会相遇，于是我们年复一年地等待着。如今，预言的时刻到了。”

languages.text: « Quand je me livre à la divination dans la chair et le sang des défunts, je me tourne vers une relique aussi ancienne qu'inestimable. Son {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}tarot{/g}, légué au culte par l'araignée matriarche, celle-là même qui a tissé le tout premier fil. Du temps où j'avais encore la force de quitter le temple pour guider les âmes dans leur dernier voyage, l'écheveau inextricable du destin m'est apparu et les cartes m'ont prédit notre rencontre. Toutefois, elles ne m'ont pas dit quand cette rencontre aurait lieu. Alors, nous avons attendu, année après année. Et aujourd'hui, l'heure est enfin venue. »
languages.original_text: "As I delve into my divinations from the flesh and blood of the departed ones, I turn to a relic most ancient and priceless. It is {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, inherited by the cult from the Matriarch Spider who spun the first thread. One of the readings I did back when I still had the strength to leave the temple and usher souls on their final journey. That was when, in the intricate tangle of destiny, I glimpsed our meeting. But when we would meet, alas, was not revealed to me. So we waited, year after year. And now the hour has come."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je me livre à la divination dans la chair et le sang des défunts, je me tourne vers une relique aussi ancienne qu'inestimable. Toutefois, elles ne m'ont pas dit quand cette rencontre aurait lieu. Alors, nous avons attendu, année après année. Et aujourd'hui, l'heure est enfin venue. »

languages.text: "Yitip gidenleri etiyle ve kanıyla gördüğüm kehanetlere daha da daldıkça en kadim ve paha biçilemeyecek türden bir yadigâra başvurmuştum. Bu yadigâr, ilk ipliği ören Örümcek Kraliçe'den tarikata miras kalmış olan {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}O'nun Tarotu'ydu{/g}. Hâlâ tapınaktan ayrılacak ve ruhları son yolculuklarına uğurlayacak gücüm varken yaptığım okumalardan biriydi. İşte o vakitte, yazgının o çetrefilli düğümünde karşılaşmamızı göz ucuyla görmüştüm. Fakat ne yazık ki ne zaman karşılaşacağımız bilgisi bana bahşedilmedi. Ben de yıllar boyunca bekledim. En nihayetinde vakti geldi."
languages.original_text: "As I delve into my divinations from the flesh and blood of the departed ones, I turn to a relic most ancient and priceless. It is {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, inherited by the cult from the Matriarch Spider who spun the first thread. One of the readings I did back when I still had the strength to leave the temple and usher souls on their final journey. That was when, in the intricate tangle of destiny, I glimpsed our meeting. But when we would meet, alas, was not revealed to me. So we waited, year after year. And now the hour has come."
